properties.address: Knowle Public Library, Broadwalk Shopping Centre, 1 Wells Road, , Bristol BS4 2QU
properties.description: Open from 16-11-2022. We are opening the library for an hour on a Wednesday morning when it is usually closed. Come along to find warmth, conversation, newspapers, knitting, reading, a quiet corner, free tea and coffee.
properties.title: Friends of Knowle Library
